behaviors.desc:
Use `Polymer.IronValidatorBehavior` to implement a custom input/form validator. Element
instances implementing this behavior will be registered for use in elements that implement
`Polymer.IronValidatableBehavior`.

jsdoc.description:
Use `Polymer.IronValidatorBehavior` to implement a custom input/form validator. Element
instances implementing this behavior will be registered for use in elements that implement
`Polymer.IronValidatableBehavior`.
jsdoc.orig:
*
   * Use `Polymer.IronValidatorBehavior` to implement a custom input/form validator. Element
   * instances implementing this behavior will be registered for use in elements that implement
   * `Polymer.IronValidatableBehavior`.
   * 
   * @demo demo/index.html
   * @polymerBehavior

properties.name: validate
properties.desc: Implement custom validation logic in this function.

params.name: values
params.desc: The value to validate. May be any type depending on the validation logic.

jsdoc.description: Implement custom validation logic in this function.

tags.name: values
tags.description: The value to validate. May be any type depending on the validation logic.

jsdoc.orig:
*
     * Implement custom validation logic in this function.
     * @param {Object} values The value to validate. May be any type depending on the validation logic.
     * @return {Boolean} true if `values` is valid.

properties.name: validatorName
properties.desc: Name for this validator, used by `Polymer.IronValidatableBehavior` to lookup this element.

jsdoc.description: Name for this validator, used by `Polymer.IronValidatableBehavior` to lookup this element.
jsdoc.orig:
*
       * Name for this validator, used by `Polymer.IronValidatableBehavior` to lookup this element.
